definitions.text: understanding of the nature or meaning or quality or magnitude of something
examples: he has a good grasp of accounting practices
arrogance and lack of taste contributed to his rapid success
to ask at that particular time was the ultimate in bad taste
he expressed his appreciation in a short note
a small token in admiration of your works

definitions.text: an increase in price or value
examples: an appreciation of 30% in the value of real estate
